front.title: RTP Payload Format for IP-MR Speech Codec draft-ietf-avt-rtp-ipmr-07.txt

abstract.t: This document specifies the payload format for packetization of SPIRIT IP-MR encoded speech signals into the Real-time Transport Protocol (RTP). The payload format supports transmission of multiple frames per payload and introduced redundancy for robustness against packet loss. Table of Contents
